typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	ProcessName as string,
	FileName as string,
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Asset_ID]\n      ,[Fund_ID]\n      ,[Reporting_Period]\nFROM [staging].[OPS_Answers]',
	format: 'query') ~> StagingDB
ConvertDate select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectOutput
SelectOutput alterRow(deleteIf(not(isNull(Reporting_Period)))) ~> AlterRowDelete
StagingDB derive(Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period,'dd/MM/yyyy')) ~> ConvertDate
AlterRowDelete sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		UID as string,
		Attribute as string,
		Answer_Number as integer,
		Text_Response as string,
		Numeric_Response as decimal(19,4),
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:true,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Fund_ID','Asset_ID','Reporting_Period'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period
	)) ~> DeleteRecords
